item.title: The problem with installing SQL Server Express via the Microsoft Web Platform Installer
item.description: If you use Web Platform Installer to install SQL Server Express, you might be in for a surprise if you try to install AdventureWorks.

item.title: Installing SQL Server Express 2008 on Windows Server 2003
item.description: In this article we install Microsoft SQL Server Express 2008 on a virtual machine running Windows Server 2003.

item.title: Programmatic SQL command timeout using a SqlDataSource (C#)
item.description: How to programmatically set a timeout on a Sql command, using a SqlDataSource, in C#.

item.title: Programmatic MSSQL data source in ASP.NET (C#) without System.Web
item.description: Another way to programmatically make a database call, but this time without extra System.Web includes.

item.title: Programmatic MSSQL data source in ASP.NET (C#)
item.description: The code I've been using to open a connection, programmatically, to Microsoft SQL Server.
